CustomField.description:
Status of a Contact that determines its marketing eligibility. Values are updated in real time by Polytomic.
(waterfall logic, each group would exclude those preceding) - Disqualified: all contacts associated with competitors, Retool internal, test, junk - Demand Suppressed: contact who is opt out, bounce, no longer at company, junk - Committed Customer: all contacts at an account who is a committed customer - Open Opportunity: all contacts at an account with any open or resting Opportunity - Open Journey: any contact with an open or resting Journey, aka MQL - Demand Marketable: any contact thatâ€™s opted into emails - Demand Unmarketable: everyone else
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the status of a Contact that determines its marketing eligibility.
CustomField.label: Contact Status
